# WhispyrX

**WhispyrX** is a peer-to-peer terminal chat application built using the [Textual](https://textual.textualize.io/) TUI framework. It allows users to join or create chat rooms and exchange text and files in real time â€” directly from the terminal.

- Real-time peer-to-peer chat
- Terminal User Interface (TUI)
- File transfer support with resume and cancel
- Nickname customization
- Typing indicators
- Emoji support (e.g. `:rocket:` becomes ğŸš€)
